input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following product specifications and product name information.

Product name:
MotoFab Lifts CH-2.5-2.5" Front Leveling Lift Kit That Will Raise The Front Of Your Chevy/Gmc Pickup 2.5"

Product specifications:
Will Raise the front of your truck by a true 2.5"
Motofab Lifts are CNC machined out of billet aluminum then powdercoated black to match your factory suspension.
Can be installed in about 1 1/2-2 hours and does not require strut/coil disassembly like other kits.
Instructions and all necessary hardware included
Lift spacer thickness and lift is not a 1 to 1 ratio due to the suspension geometry.
Made In The USA 
Fits 2007-2018 Silverado / Sierra 2WD & 4WD (new body style)

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This Chrome Plated Angel ornament features Austrian Swarovski Crystal. The design is 6.5 IN x 2 IN x 2 IN. This is an original Crystal Delight ornament! This Chrome Plated Swarovski Crystals sparkle beautifully against the light featuring superb craftsmanship and will be the finishing touch to just about any room in your home! This is absolutely the perfect gift for Valentine's day or Mother's day!
input_text.Response B: Looking for a lift kit that's quick and easy to install? This MotoFab Front Leveling Lift Kit can be installed in about 1 1/2-2 hours and does not require strut/coil disassembly like other kits. This kit will raise the front of your Chevy or GMC truck by a true 2.5". Motofab Lifts are CNC machined out of billet aluminum and then powder coated black to match your factory suspension. These high-quality spacers are the strongest on the market and will not crack over time like other welded spacers. Made is the USA, the kit comes complete with instructions and all the necessary hardware. This lift kit fits the 2007-2018 Silverado and Sierra 2WD & 4WD. Please note: Lift spacer thickness and lift is not a 1 to 1 ratio due to the suspension geometry.
